content.html: I only use ESLint warnings, no errors. Here's why: Locally, ESLint errors may fail some processes, and thus, force me to fix something immediately before I can continue work. A warning never blocks work. So, I can delay fixing the issue until I'm ready to open a PR. 1/2
content.value:
I only use ESLint warnings, no errors.

Here's why: Locally, ESLint errors may fail some processes, and thus, force me to fix something immediately before I can continue work. 

A warning never blocks work.

So, I can delay fixing the issue until I'm ready to open a PR.

1/2
